summary:
## Search Engines: Finding Information Online

Search engines help us find websites and information on the internet. When you type a question or word into a search box, the engine looks through its huge index of web pages and shows you relevant results. These are usually lists of links with short descriptions.

Google is the most popular search engine, used by 91% of people worldwide. It's so important that websites often try to improve their ranking in Google's results.
title: Search engine
